INSERT INTO t_operation_info ( operation_id, operation_name, operation_desc, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date )
(SELECT #{item.operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.operationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.operationDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} FROM DUAL )
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_operation_info SET operation_name = #{operationName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_desc = #{operationDesc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_date = #{createdDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy, jdbcType=BIGINT}, updated_date = #{updatedDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE
AND operation_id = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.sql: a.operation_id, a.operation_name, a.operation_desc, a.created_by, a.created_date, a.updated_by, a.updated_date
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_operation_info a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.operation_id = #{operationId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
